activeDialog.title: Do you want to active this privacy policy?
activeDialog.message: This policy will change display time to now! Are you sure?

message.cantDelete: You can't delete active policy. Please active 1 another policy and delete after that!
message.validateDisplay: Time is coincided with another policy's time!

warningDialog.title: You can't active this policy!
warningDialog.message: You can't active this policy because there is a policy had display time equal now! Please set another time and try again
